page.title: 12Farming and the New Town
page.content: The Farmer lost a lot of land to the Newtown.He has three farms but the one at Fernhead now has only the farmhouse where his mother still lives.He keeps three dogs who are useful pets.They give warning if strangers come to the farm.If Kim barks for a short time it means someone is passing, but if she continues barking they need to come back from the Moss to investigate. The farm has a 7-8year old tractor,a potato-harvester and a combine harvester.He also has an old balance plough which he calls a farming antique.He often works a 14 hour day, starting at 6 a.m.He hasn't got a favourite job on the farm but he hates doing the paper work.His father was a farmer too so it does seem to run in the family.His father started farming at Fernhead in 1931.
